named-query.name: Teacher.getByPesel
named-query.query: SELECT t FROM Teacher t JOIN FETCH t.user u JOIN FETCH t.personInformation pi WHERE pi.pesel = :pesel AND u.role.id = 2

named-query.name: Teacher.getByUsername
named-query.query: SELECT t FROM Teacher t JOIN FETCH t.user u JOIN FETCH t.personInformation pi WHERE u.username = :username
